creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: eight lines of neatly written calligraphy; first two lines are only a few characters; last line is also short; oval relief stamp URC; large square intaglio stamp at L edge; large square relief stamp at L edge
markings: URC, oval relief; L center square intaglio; L center square relief; on back, top edge, ULC, in pencil: [Uno Gensho]
title: Eight-Line Poem
